TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientBuildManagerCallback extends System.MarshalByRefObject

Docs.summary: Receives status information about a build from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback> object can be passed to the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> object through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.PrecompileApplication%2A> method. When an error is encountered during an application build, the error is passed as an argument to either the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback.ReportCompilerError%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback.ReportParseError%2A> method, depending on the type of error. When you create a class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback> class, you can implement these methods and retrieve the error.
